column4: Here's a question that bothered me... why doesn't Ubuntu see shared printers by default, since it uses CUPS (brrr)?
I agree, but that doesn't change the fact that it doesn't see shared printers, which is supposedly one of CUPS' "big deals".  I wondered why that decision had been made.
you can put that on ubuntus feature request or something.
Not me, I'm just hanging out watching.  It's not like I'll ever use it, it just struck me as odd.
